children.text: Click on an item to start typing.
Press `Enter` to split an item or create a new one.
Press `Shift+Enter` to create a new line within an item.
Press `Tab` to indent an item (make it a child).
Press `Shift+Tab` to outdent an item.
Zoom In: Click a bullet point to focus on that item and its children.
Zoom Out: Use the breadcrumbs at the top or press `Ctrl+Up` to go back.
Expand/Collapse: Click the triangle next to an item to show or hide its children.
Daily Log: Press `Ctrl+J` to jump directly to a special section for today's date.
Quick Find: Press `Ctrl+Shift+K` to open the search bar.
Tags: Type `#tagname` to create a tag, which will be visually highlighted.
Creating & Editing
Enter : Create a new item or split the current one
Shift+Enter : Add a new line within the current item
Tab : Indent current item
Shift+Tab : Outdent current item
Backspace (on an empty item) : Delete the item
Ctrl+L : Turn selected text into a link
[[ : Start typing to link to another item
Navigation & View
Up/Down Arrow : Navigate between items
Ctrl+Down Arrow (or click bullet) : Zoom in
Ctrl+Up Arrow : Zoom out
Ctrl+Left Arrow : Collapse item (if it has children) or go to parent
Ctrl+Right Arrow : Expand a collapsed item
Ctrl+J : Go to today's log
Ctrl+Shift+K : Open the "Quick Find" window
Organizing
Alt+Up Arrow : Move item up
Alt+Down Arrow : Move item down
2024-07-29: Further Optimization
Moved the changelog into the external `help-documentation.json` file.
Externalized all application CSS into a separate `index.css` file.
These changes make the main HTML file even smaller and faster to load.
2024-07-28: Major Simplification
Streamlined the application by removing all traces of the old sidebar functionality from the documentation.
Moved the extensive "Help & Documentation" content into a separate `help-documentation.json` file to reduce initial load size.
You can import the new JSON file at any time to access the full guide.
Sync & UI Updates
Removed GitHub Sync functionality in favor of local indexedDB storage.
Bug Fixes & Optimizations
Refactored internal bullet addition logic for better consistency.
Code Refactoring & Cleanup
Removed unused color utility functions.
Upgraded object cloning to `structuredClone` for better performance.
Improved unique ID generation using `crypto.randomUUID`.
Optimized text rendering to reduce unnecessary recalculations.
